items.name: Wikininja
items.title: Wikininja
items.headline: Welcome to WikiNinja
items.desc: Did you know that Ninja started their training at the age of four or that Ninja were thought to have supernatural powers? Both facts and more can be found within the Ninja Wiki, also known as WikiNinja! This wiki is a codex containing information on all aspects of the ninja. Topics range from their history to their future, the arsenal of swords and clothing they utilized, and their way of life.

items.name: Ninjago Wiki
items.title: Ninjago Wiki
items.desc: Everything you need to know about Ninjago should be on here. If you know anything be free to help!
